TEXT: CARDINAL . Mrs PERSON lives in GPE , where she is employed at the local health unit ( “ the ORG ” ) .

CARDINAL . The present application concerns CARDINAL sets of proceedings , the first CARDINAL of which were instituted by the ORG against the applicant in ORG ( “ the ORG ” ) and DATE by PERSON against the ORG in the same court . They concern the post assigned to the applicant at the ORG and her remuneration following the dissolution of ORG ( Consorzio provinciale antitubercolare ) , where she had formerly worked as an administrator . She contested in particular a series of decisions by which her new employer had assigned her to a staff category lower than the one to which she considered herself to be entitled .

CARDINAL . The first set of proceedings began on DATE . In a decision of CARDINAL DATE the ORG ordered a stay of execution of the decision being challenged . In an interlocutory judgment of CARDINAL DATE it ordered the ORG to file certain documents . On DATE the applicant applied to the court registry for the proceedings to be expedited .

CARDINAL . The second set of proceedings began on DATE . In a decision of CARDINAL DATE the ORG ordered a stay of execution of the decision in question . In an interlocutory judgment of CARDINAL DATE it ordered the ORG to file certain documents . On DATE the applicant applied to the court registry for the proceedings to be expedited .

CARDINAL . The third set of proceedings began on DATE . In a decision of CARDINAL DATE the ORG dismissed the application for execution of the decision to be stayed . In an interlocutory judgment of CARDINAL DATE it ordered the ORG to file certain documents . On DATE the applicant applied to the court registry for the proceedings to be expedited .

CARDINAL . The fourth set of proceedings began on DATE . In a decision of CARDINAL DATE the ORG allowed , in part , the application for execution of the decision to be stayed . In an interlocutory judgment of CARDINAL DATE it ordered the ORG to file certain documents . On DATE , the applicant applied to the court registry for the proceedings to be expedited .

CARDINAL . The fifth set of proceedings began on CARDINAL DATE . In an interlocutory judgment of CARDINAL DATE the ORG ordered the ORG to file certain documents . On DATE the applicant applied to the court registry for the proceedings to be expedited .
CARDINAL . According to the observations submitted by the applicant in DATE , the proceedings were then still pending .
